doc.name: PtidesTopLevelDirector
doc.description: Code generator adapter associated with the PTIDESDirector class. This class is also associated with a code generator. Top-level director for PTIDES models. Unlike in the ptolemy implementation, this level generates code for communication between different platforms. Such that events are transmitted to the correct platform, and the platforms can distinguish from which actor should fire these events
doc.author: Jia Zou, Jeff C. Jensen
